summary: This is an email with the subject 'Re: OPR Epstein Final Report', sent from a Department of Justice email address. The email appears to be a forwarded or embedded message concerning an Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) final report related to Jeffrey Epstein.
keyFacts: The email subject references an 'OPR Epstein Final Report', indicating the existence of a final report from the Department of Justice's Office of Professional Responsibility concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The email was sent from a Department of Justice email address (@usa.doj.gov) on January 29, 2021.
The email appears to be a forwarded or embedded message, as indicated by the 'Embedded' field referencing a file named 'Re:_OPR_Epstein_Final_Report.msg'.
